rules_text:
At the beginning of each upkeep, choose one –
• [i]Sky on a Sunny Day – [/i]Draw a card.
• [i]Lucky Four-Leaf Clover – [/i]Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
• [i]Dandelions Along a Path – [/i]Tap target creature. Surveil 1.
• [i]Liquid Flowing From a Slashed Wrist – [/i]This enchantment deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.
